Class EmployeeDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • EmployeeDAO

  • public class EmployeeDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Employee Database Access Object, the application will go through this to reach the database in order to manipulate employee data. (Features all CRUD methods).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Faisal Kabeer
